#f9ffワイヤレスつうしん

#f9ffせいじつのしょうちょうトパーズは⏎#f9ff目もくらむ黄金色
Google Translate: #f9ffThe most beautiful topaz is ⏎#f9ffA dazzling golden color
Translated: #f9ffせいじつのしょうちょうトパーズは⏎#f9ff目もくらむ黄金色

Japanese: #f9ffしんじつをみちびくアメジストは⏎#f9ff気高いむらさき
Google Translate: #f9ffThe amethyst that guides the truth is ⏎#f9ff the noble purple
Translated: #f9ffしんじつをみちびくアメジストは⏎#f9ff気高いむらさき

Japanese: #f9ff力とじゅんけつのしょうちょう⏎#f9ffダイアモンドは冷たくかがやく
Google Translate: #f9ffThe power and power of the fire⏎#f9ffThe diamond shines coldly
Translated: #f9ff力とじゅんけつのしょうちょう⏎#f9ffダイアモンドは冷たくかがやく

Japanese: #f9ffめいよのあかしのエメラルドは⏎#f9ffつややかなみどり色
Translated: #f9ffめいよのあかしのエメラルドは⏎#f9ffつややかなみどり色

Japanese: #f9ff神に通じるラピスラズリは⏎#f9ffぐんじょうの夜にちった星
Google Translate: #f9ffLapis lazuli, which leads to God, is ⏎#f9ffThe star that fell on Gunjo's night
Translated: #f9ff神に通じるラピスラズリは⏎#f9ffぐんじょうの夜にちった星

Japanese: #f9ffこうふくのしょうちょうルビーは⏎#f9ffしたたるような赤
Translated: #f9ffこうふくのしょうちょうルビーは⏎#f9ffしたたるような赤

Japanese: #f9ff希望をもたらすオパールは⏎#f9ffにじのごとく7色に
Google Translate: #f9ffThe opal that brings hope comes in 7 colors like a rainbow ⏎#f9ff
Translated: #f9ff希望をもたらすオパールは⏎#f9ffにじのごとく7色に

Japanese: 『デルトラ王国 デルの町』
Translated: 『デルトラ王国 デルの町』

Japanese: こんな町……早く出たいよ
Google Translate: A town like this...I want to leave as soon as possible
Translated:
Del… I need to get⏎
out of this town…

Japanese: 影の大王のしるしが ないところなら⏎どこだっていいや
Google Translate: As long as there is no sign of the Great Shadow King, I don't care where.
Translated:
Life is miserable⏎
under the Shadow Lord

Japanese: まずいぞ……⏎影の憲兵団(けんぺいだん)だ……⏸見つからないようにしなくちゃ
Google Translate: That's bad...⏎It's the Shadow Military Police Corps...⏸We have to make sure they don't find us.
Translated:
Uh-oh!⏎
Grey Guards!⏸
Can’t let them find⏎
me out this late!

Japanese: おい! こんな時間になにしてる!
Google Translate: Hey! What are you doing at this hour?
Translated:
Hey you!⏸
What are you doing out⏎
after sunset?!

Japanese: (やばい にげろ!)
(あぶなかった…⏎憲兵につかまったらたいへんだ)
Google Translate: (It was dangerous...⏎It would be difficult if the military police caught me)
Translated: (あぶなかった…⏎憲兵につかまったらたいへんだ)

Japanese: (夕方までに帰るって⏎約束したのに……)⏸(母さん、心配してるだろうな……)
Google Translate: (I promised I would be back by evening...)⏸(Mom, you must be worried...)
Translated:
(I promised I would be⏎
home before sunset…)⏸
(Mother must be⏎
worried…)

Japanese: あのこぞう、どこへ行った?
Google Translate: Where did that little bird go?

Japanese: あれは かじ屋の息子だぞ
Translated:
I think that’s the⏎
blacksmith’s kid

Japanese: (ばれてる!?)
それじゃあ、オヤジを⏎いためつけてやるか
Google Translate: Well then, shall I torture the old man?
Translated:
Then let’s go make his⏎
dad suffer for this!

Japanese: いや、やめとけ。⏎あのかじ屋、うではいいんだ⏸すばらしい剣を安く⏎つくらせる事ができる
Google Translate: No, stop it. ⏎That swordsmith can make you a great sword cheaply⏎
Translated:
Hey、not so fast!⏸
That codger can make a⏎
great sword for cheap!

Japanese: 安い? いくらだ?
そりゃおまえ、タダ!
Translated:
For us? We’ll take it⏎
for free!

Japanese: わははは、そりゃいい!⏸かじ屋のくやしそうな顔が⏎目にうかぶぜ!
Google Translate: Hahahaha, that's good! ⏸The Kajiya's disgusted face ⏎appears in my eyes!
Translated:
Grahahaha、yes!⏸
I can’t wait to see⏎
the fear in his eyes!

Japanese: (ゆるせない……)
見つけたぞ、こぞう!
ゆるさない!
げひひひひ!
(しまった……)
さっきの いきおいはどうした!
バルダ!?
さあ、にげるぞ!
うわっ!
Notes: Wow indeed. Apparently Barda is a rhinoceros

Japanese: まったく……⏸夕方までに帰って来いと⏎言われていただろうに⏸オレがいなかったら⏎どうなっていた事やら
Google Translate: At all... ⏸You would have told me to be back by evening⏸⏸If I hadn't been there⏎I wonder what would have happened.
Translated:
Harumph!⏸
You know you can’t be⏎
out after sunset!⏸
If I hadn’t been⏎
there to save you…

Japanese: だって……
だってだってだってだって!⏎なさけないやつだ
Google Translate: Because, because, because! ⏎I miss him so much!

Japanese: なさけない!?⏸バルダだって同じだよ!⏎いそうろうのくせに!
Google Translate: Sorry!? ⏸ It's the same with Barda! ⏎ Even though he's so cute!
Translated:
What were you doing⏎
out there、Barda?⏸
Even a beggar like⏎
you can’t be out late!

Japanese: たしかにオレは ジャードと⏎アンナの世話になっている⏸つまりおまえと同じだ
Google Translate: It's true that I'm under the care of Jard and Anna, so I'm just like you.
Translated:
True… Jarred and Ana⏎
watch over me too⏸
You and I are not so⏎
different

Japanese: ふん!
まずいんだ⏸ぼくがここの家の子だって⏎憲兵団に知られてた
Google Translate: It's bad⏸I'm from this family⏎The military police knew it.
Translated:
Ah… the Grey Guards⏎
recognized me earlier⏸
We’re all in danger!

Japanese: それは……いい きっかけだな
Translated:
Hmm… this might be⏎
a good opportunity

Japanese: どういう意味?
町を出たいんだろう?⏸さあ、中でジャードと話してこい。⏎旅の じゅんびは できているぞ
Google Translate: You want to leave town, right?⏸Now, go inside and talk to Jard. ⏎He's ready for the trip.
Translated:
You want to get out⏎
of Del、don’t you?⏸
Now go talk to your⏎
father⏸
The preparations for⏎
the journey are done

Japanese: (旅のじゅんび?)
父さん……おそくなってごめん。⏎でも、デルトラの書は かんべんして⏸もう、あんきするくらい 読んだよ
Google Translate: Dad...I'm sorry I'm late. ⏎But I've read Deltora's book completely⏸I've read it enough to feel relieved.
Translated:
Father… I’m sorry…⏸
But don’t make me⏎
read the book again!⏸
I’ve read it so many⏎
times I’m sick of it!

Japanese: (よけいな事を言っちゃった。⏎これは 長いおせっきょうに なるぞ……)
Google Translate: (I said something stupid. ⏎This is going to be a long rant...)
Translated:
(Why did I say that?⏎
I’m in for it now!)

Japanese: (い、息がつまりそうだ。⏎なにかしゃべらないと……)
Google Translate: (I-I feel like I'm suffocating. ⏎I have to say something...)
Translated:
(I can’t breathe! I’ve⏎
gotta say something!)

Japanese: バルダが へんな事を言うんだ。⏎ぼくが旅に出るとかさ
Google Translate: Barda says something strange. ⏎I'm going on a journey.
Translated:
Barda just said⏎
something strange!⏸
Something about me⏎
going on a journey?

Japanese: ああ、それは本当だ。⏎しかも、とても きけんな旅だ
Google Translate: Oh, that's true. ⏎Moreover, she is on a very dangerous journey.

Japanese: ことわってもいいのよ、リーフ
Google Translate: It's okay to say something, Leaf.

Japanese: わたしの話を聞いてから⏎自分で きめるんだ
Google Translate: Listen to me and then decide for yourself.
Translated:
Listen to me and then⏎
decide for yourself

Japanese: (な、なんだ!?)
これは……デルトラのベルトだ
Translated:
This… is the⏎
Belt of Deltora

Japanese: え!? 王家に伝わるベルトだよね?⏎どうしてこれがうちに!?
Google Translate: Huh!? It's a belt passed down through the royal family, right? ⏎Why do we have this!?
Translated:
Huh!? The belt is⏎
passed down through⏸
The royal family、⏎
isn’t it?⏸
Why do we have it!?

Japanese: 父さんは むかし、お城に⏎住んでいたんだ
Google Translate: Once upon a time, my father lived in a castle.
Translated:
A long time ago、I⏎
lived in the palace
Notes: I’m pretty sure Google translate is getting confused by pronouns or something. This is an unlikely change, so I’m sticking with the books.

Japanese: 本当に!?
そして さいごのデルトラの王⏎エンドンの親友だった
Google Translate: And the final King of Deltora was Endon's best friend.
Translated:
I was close friends⏎
with Endon、the last⏸
King of Deltora

Japanese: まぬけのエンドン王?
そう……彼は世間知らずの⏎おろか者だった⏸今はどこで何を⏎しているのか……
Google Translate: Yes...he was a naive idiot.Where is he and what is he doing now?
Translated:
Yes… he was a fool⏸
I wonder where he is⏎
now…

Japanese: 生きてるの?
さあな⏸しかし彼の子ども……王家の⏎あとつぎは 生きているはずだ⏸その あとつぎを おまえに⏎見つけだしてほしい⏸この国を影の大王から⏎すくうためだ
Google Translate: Now, his child...the next member of the royal family should be alive, and I want you to find him in order to save this country from the shadow king.
Translated:
Who knows? But his⏎
child、the next heir⏸
should be alive。I⏎
want you to find him⏸
and save Deltora from⏎
the Shadow Lord

Japanese: (すごい話だな。でも……)
あとつぎがいたって⏎無理じゃないのかな……⏸だって、おろかなエンドン王の⏎子どもでしょ?
Google Translate: I guess it's impossible for there to be a successor... After all, he's the child of the stupid King Endon, right?
Translated:
Even if the heir is⏎
alive、what’s the use?⏸
The child of King⏎
Endon the Fool?

Japanese: このベルトがあれば だいじょうぶだ⏸まずベルトに7この⏎宝石をはめる⏸それを王家のあとつぎが⏎身につければ……
Google Translate: If you have this belt, you'll be fine⏸First, put seven ⏎jewels on the belt⏸If the next member of the royal family wears it...
Translated:
Keep the belt safe⏸
First you must gather⏎
the 7 gems⏸
Then the heir must⏎
wear them on the belt

Japanese: そうか、いつか⏎教えてくれた話だね?
Google Translate: I see, you told me about it sometime, right?

Japanese: アディンは 七部族を せっとくして⏎宝石をあつめた⏎⏎七つの宝石を 自分でつくった⏎ベルトにつけて こしにまいた⏎⏎すると ベルトはたいようのように⏎光り かがやいた
Google Translate: Adin assisted the seven tribes and collected the precious stones.He made the seven jewels and put them on his belt and sprinkled them in a strainer.Then the belt shone like a star.
Translated:
Adin gathered the 7⏎
Gems from the 7 tribes⏎
and attached them to⏎
the belt he had made。⏎
When he put it on、⏎
it shone as bright⏎
as the sun。

Japanese: デルトラの七部族は その光の⏎もとで だんけつして たたかった⏎⏎こうして めでたく 影の大王を⏎おいはらう事ができた
Google Translate: The seven tribes of Deltora fought under that light and were happily able to capture the King of Shadows.
Translated:
The tribes of Deltora⏎
United behind him、and⏎
Together they drove⏎
The Enemy from their⏎
land。
Notes: I got this pretty close to the words in the book.

Japanese: そう⏸そのベルトの力が昔と同じように⏎デルトラを すくってくれるはずだ
Google Translate: Yes, the power of that belt will scoop up Deltora just like before.
Translated:
Good⏸
The power of the Belt⏎
can save Deltora again

Japanese: でも、父さん⏸このベルトには宝石が⏎ついていない……
Google Translate: But, Dad, there are no jewels on this belt...
Translated:
But… there are no⏎
Gems on the Belt…

Japanese: ……宝石もさがすんだね?
Translated:
You want me to find⏎
the Gems too?

Japanese: そのとおり
リーフ、ことわってもいいのよ⏸無理に旅立たせるような⏎事はしないから⏸あなたはまだ16才なんだし
Google Translate: Leaf, it's okay to say something. I won't force you to go on a journey. You're only 16 years old.
Translated:
Lief、it’s okay。 We⏎
won’t force you to go⏸
You’re still a kid

Japanese: 母さん……⏸ぼくはもう16才だよ
リーフ……
これは父さんからの⏎おくり物だ⏸父さんがつくった剣。⏎今までで さいこうのできばえだ
Google Translate: This is a ⏎gift from my father⏸ a sword made by my father. ⏎He's the best he's ever been.
Translated:
This sword is my gift⏎
to you⏸
It’s the finest one⏎
I’ve ever made

Japanese: ありがとう
これは母さんからだ
Translated:
And this cloak is⏎
from your mother
Notes: And some more pronoun confusion for good measure.

Japanese: たくさんの思い出と⏎愛情をこめてつくったのよ
Google Translate: Made with lots of memories and love.
Translated:
The fabric is… special⏸
I wove it with lots of⏎
love and memories

Japanese: 母さん、ありがとう!
心配しないで⏸この国をすくう力に⏎なれるんだから⏸ぼくは よろこんで旅に出るよ!
Google Translate: Don't worry, I'll be able to help save this country, so I'll be happy to go on this journey!
Translated:
I want to go、Mother!⏎
Do not weep for me!⏸
I’m happy to help⏎
save Deltora!

Japanese: 本当なら わたしが⏎行くつもりだったのだが……
Google Translate: If it was true, I was going to go, but...
Translated:
In truth、I was going⏎
to go myself、but…

Japanese: 父さんは足がよくないんだもの。⏎わかっているから気にしないで
Google Translate: My father doesn't have good legs. ⏎I understand, so don't worry about it

Japanese: いつ行くの?
今さ!
リーフ、伝えなくていいのか?⏎影の憲兵団に おわれていると
Google Translate: Leaf, do I have to tell you?⏎I'm being surrounded by the Shadow Military Police Corps.
Translated:
Lief、did you forget?⏸
We’ve been surrounded⏎
by Grey Guards

Japanese: リーフ!?
うん、ごめん……
忘れろ、リーフ
ジャード、おまえも きけんに⏎さらされるんだぞ
Google Translate: Jard, you too are in danger.

Japanese: わたしの事は⏎心配するな⏸息子は家から おい出したとでも⏎言っておくさ
Google Translate: Don't worry about me, I'll tell you that my son has been taken out of the house.
Translated:
Don’t worry about me⏸
I’ll tell them I⏎
kicked Lief out

Japanese: うむ……
リーフ、おまえは 町を⏎にげ出すんじゃない⏸世界を影の大王から⏎すくうために旅立つのだ
Google Translate: Leaf, you're not leaving the town, you're leaving to save the world from the Shadow King.
Translated:
Lief、this isn’t just⏎
a chance to leave Del⏸
You’re saving Deltora⏎
from the Shadow Lord

Japanese: ……はい
気をつけてな
いってきます……
Translated:
I… I guess this is⏎
goodbye…

Japanese: たよりない返事だな。⏎旅に出すのは早かったのか?
Google Translate: That's an incredible answer. ⏎Was it too early to go on a trip?
Translated:
You seem… hesitant⏸
Are you sure you can⏎
handle this?

Japanese: 父さん……
もう何も言うな。行け、リーフ
Google Translate: Don't say anything anymore. Go, Leaf

Japanese: (ぼくは にげ出すんじゃない……)
父さん、母さん、行ってきます!
おい、リーフ! 待て!
バルダ!?
オレも いっしょに行く。⏎ジャードとの約束だ
Google Translate: I'll go with you too. ⏎It's a promise with Jard.
Translated:
I’m coming with you。⏎
I promised Jarred

Japanese: (いっしょに?⏎なさけない いそうろうが!?)
Translated:
(How is an old beggar⏎
supposed to help me?)

Japanese: ここにいてくれ
(バルダ!?⏎な、なんかかっこいい……)
元デル城の兵士バルダ。⏎よろしくな
Google Translate: Barda, a former soldier of Del Castle. ⏎Nice to meet you
Translated:
I’m Barda、former⏎
palace guard⏸
Nice to finally meet⏎
you properly

Japanese: 元城の兵士!?
兵士といっても ただの兵士ではない⏸王の身を守る、とくべつな兵士だ
Google Translate: Even though he's a soldier, he's not just a soldier ⏸ He's a special soldier who protects the king.
Translated:
Yes、we were elite⏎
soldiers、sworn to⏸
protect the King

Japanese: (じまんなのかな……)
さて、出発するか
う、うん……でも、どこへ?
Translated:
Oh、um、yeah…⏎
But where do we go?

Japanese: デルトラのベルトについていた⏎宝石は影の大王がかくしてしまった⏸7つの宝石を7つのばしょにな
Google Translate: The Great King of Shadows hid the jewels that were on Deltora's belt.
Translated:
The Shadow Lord⏎
scattered the gems⏸
They are hidden in⏎
places no one would⏸
dare to find them

Japanese: オレとジャードで⏎しらべたところによると……⏸宝石のひとつは⏎『ちんもくの森』にあるらしい
Google Translate: According to what I and Jard ⏎ researched... ⏸ one of the jewels is ⏎ in the ``Chinmoku Forest''.
Translated:
We’ve been listening⏎
for clues as to where⏸
We believe one is in⏎
the Forests of Silence

Japanese: ちんもくの森……
あそこには おそろしい かいぶつが⏎すみついている⏸そのせいで影の憲兵団も⏎あまり近よらないそうだ
Google Translate: There's a terrifying creature living there, which is why the shadow military police don't come too close.
Translated:
There’s some sort of⏎
monster there⏸
Even the Grey Guards⏎
stay away

Japanese: (おそろしい かいぶつ……)
おじけづいたか?
まさか!⏸憲兵団がいないなら⏎安心だと思ったんだ
Google Translate: No way!⏸If there were no military police,⏎I thought it would be safe.
Translated:
What? No!⏸
Without Grey Guards、⏎
We should safer!

Japanese: だといいが……
バルダは おじけづいたの?
ああ、こわいさ
Translated:
There is much to fear⏎
out there

Japanese: たよりないなあ
ふん! おまえの無知が⏎うらやましいよ
Google Translate: Hmph! I'm jealous of your ignorance.
Translated:
Hah! I’m jealous of⏎
your ignorance!

Japanese: (やっぱりバルダは はらが立つな……)
どうした? 怒ったか?
Translated:
What’s wrong? Did I⏎
hurt your feelings?

Japanese: こうして少年リーフと⏎元デル城の兵士バルダの旅がはじまった。
Google Translate: And so began the journey of the boy Leaf and Barda, a former soldier of Del Castle.
Translated:
And so began the⏎
journey of the young⏎
boy Lief and the⏎
former palace guard⏎
Barda…
Notes: Fullscreen text display on bottom screen with illustration on top screen of Lief and Barda walking away from Del.
